AUTHOR: Redjumpman
INSTALL_MSG:
This cog requires Tabulate and BeautifulSoup4.
Type pip3 install tabulate and then type pip3 install BeautifulSoup4 into cmd prompt to install these libraries.
PM me at Redjumpman#2375 on Discord if you have issues.
NAME: Pokedex
SHORT: Returns movesets, locations, and more on Pokemon
DESCRIPTION: Shows movesets, locations, pokedex info, evolution chains, and item searches for all Pokemon generations.
